vulnerabilities.title: Potential Command Injection
vulnerabilities.description: Dynamic command execution detected. This may allow arbitrary command execution.
vulnerabilities.remediation: Validate and sanitize all input. Use subprocess with shell=False and a list of arguments.

vulnerabilities.title: Vulnerable Dependency: flask
vulnerabilities.description: Package flask version 0.12.0 has known security vulnerabilities (CVE-2018-1000656).
vulnerabilities.remediation: Update flask to a secure version.

vulnerabilities.title: Vulnerable Dependency: django
vulnerabilities.description: Package django version 2.0.0 has known security vulnerabilities (CVE-2020-7471).
vulnerabilities.remediation: Update django to a secure version.

vulnerabilities.title: Vulnerable Dependency: requests
vulnerabilities.description: Package requests version 2.18.0 has known security vulnerabilities (CVE-2018-18074).
vulnerabilities.remediation: Update requests to a secure version.

vulnerabilities.title: Vulnerable Dependency: urllib3
vulnerabilities.description: Package urllib3 version 1.20.0 has known security vulnerabilities (CVE-2019-11324).
vulnerabilities.remediation: Update urllib3 to a secure version.

vulnerabilities.title: Vulnerable Dependency: express
vulnerabilities.description: Package express version 4.16.0 has known security vulnerabilities (CVE-2019-5413).
vulnerabilities.remediation: Update express to a secure version.

vulnerabilities.title: Vulnerable Dependency: lodash

vulnerabilities.title: Vulnerable Dependency: axios

vulnerabilities.remediation: Update axios to a secure version.

vulnerabilities.title: Cryptographic Failure
vulnerabilities.description: Weak cryptographic algorithm or implementation detected.
vulnerabilities.remediation: Use strong cryptographic algorithms (SHA-256+, AES, etc.) and proper key management.

vulnerabilities.title: Security Misconfiguration

vulnerabilities.remediation: Disable debug mode in production environments.

vulnerabilities.title: Potential Sensitive Data Exposure
vulnerabilities.description: Sensitive information may be logged or exposed.
vulnerabilities.remediation: Remove sensitive data from logs. Use proper data classification and handling.

vulnerabilities.title: Potential Cross-Site Scripting (XSS)
vulnerabilities.description: Unsafe DOM manipulation detected. This may be vulnerable to XSS attacks.
vulnerabilities.remediation: Sanitize and validate all user input. Use textContent instead of innerHTML where possible.

vulnerabilities.title: Potential Cross-Site Scripting (XSS)
vulnerabilities.description: Unsafe DOM manipulation detected. This may be vulnerable to XSS attacks.
vulnerabilities.remediation: Sanitize and validate all user input. Use textContent instead of innerHTML where possible.

vulnerabilities.description: Unsafe DOM manipulation detected. This may be vulnerable to XSS attacks.

vulnerabilities.title: Weak Password Policy
vulnerabilities.description: Weak or default password detected.
vulnerabilities.remediation: Implement strong password policy and use secure defaults.

recommendations: Implement parameterized queries to prevent SQL injection
Move secrets to environment variables or secure vault
Implement secret scanning in CI/CD pipeline
Upgrade to strong cryptographic algorithms (SHA-256+, AES)
Update vulnerable dependencies to secure versions
Review session management and timeout policies
Implement security testing in CI/CD pipeline
Provide secure coding training for developers
